Package applications.console_application

Class Hour

java.lang.Object
applications.console_application.Hour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Hour>
Direct Known Subclasses:
HourForDB
public class Hour extends Object implements Comparable<Hour>
The Hour class performs hour with ridership and comment.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    comment
    Comment on the ridership metric.
    private int
    ridership
    Ridership is the number of passengers visiting a metro station per hour.
